title: honor system
body: why is It that I'm not getting my keys and stuff from games? I don't understand it, can someone help me understand and explain.

replies.body: With the launch of the new Honor system, it changed how you obtain keys slightly but you are still limited to the [**12 key fragments in about every 28 days**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233). The drops should be evenly spread out among the month, but it's possible to get them all back to back.
I have not gotten any. and I don't understand why
